SEARCH
Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tracker.model.task

Class Task

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tracker.model.task.Task
public class Task extends Object
The Task Class contains the information about each individual task includiing the taskTitle, taskDuration, and taskDetails. The Task additionally contains a CategoryLog field named category, that is the category the task belongs to.
Author:
Diya Patel, Jayani Sivakumar

      public Task(String taskTitle, int taskDuration, String taskDetails)

      taskDuration - the duration of the task
      taskDetails - the details of the task

      public void setTaskTitle(String taskTitle)
      public helper method that check for a valid task title
      Parameters:
      taskTitle - the title of the task to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter is null or empty string

    • setTaskDuration

      public void setTaskDuration(int taskDuration)
      Public helper method that checks the duration is a positive number of at least one
      Parameters:
      taskDuration - the duration of the task to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the duration is not a positive number of at least 1

    • addCategory

      public void addCategory(CategoryLog category)
      Sets the task’s CategoryLog category field
      Parameters:
      category - the category of the task
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameter is null or there is already an assigned category
